items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Unread messages are visually indicated until viewed
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and end video calls from the chat interface
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds of call initiation
Video quality adjusts dynamically based on network conditions
dependencies: WebRTC or equivalent video streaming technology
non_functional: Secure end-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed that the application will support both one-to-one and group text chats, but only one-to-one video calls initially. No details provided on platforms (web, mobile), so requirements are platform-agnostic.
